title: Incubator
description: An ominous antagonist coming after you, a great intrigue to slowly uncover, elevated by fully voiced characters, amazing cinematic cutscenes and an overall impressive production value, this is a must-play classic by the Vivient team.

title: GoldSphere
description: A wild and unhinged adventure set four years before Shadow of Chernobyl, mixing lots of open quests, puzzles, and bizarre occult mysteries. Full of Roadside Picnic references, it turns the Zone into a chaotic, unpredictable experience.

title: Wind of Time
description: The Zone has begun to devour everything, threatening all life on the planet. A time machine is invented to send a military specialist to the past, to find the source of the Zone's instability and prevent humanity's extinction.

title: Vector of Alienation
description: A deep sci-fi thriller that reimagines S.T.A.L.K.E.R.'s original storyline. Fully overhauled environments, well crafted plotlines and alternate endings, with a tense, atmospheric journey through a lonelier, more mysterious Zone.
